description: This Python script interacts with a Gemini model to upload and analyze an audio file, utilizing classes like Agent, Audio, and Gemini, and performing file operations such as upload and retrieval.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that manages interactions and responses.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A model class for interacting with Google Gemini services.

methods.name: model.get_client().files.get
methods.description: Retrieves a file from the Gemini service by name.

methods.name: model.get_client().files.upload
methods.description: Uploads a file to the Gemini service with specified configuration.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response, including audio content, to the user.
